headline: Adobe’s (ADBE) Turnaround Story Gains Shape, but Stifel Still Sees Uncertainty
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the Trending AI Stocks on Wall Street. On December 9, Stifel reduced its price target on the stock to $450.00 from $480.00 while maintaining a “Buy” rating. The price target cut comes ahead of the company’s fiscal fourth-quarter 2025 results, scheduled for release on December 10. The firm noted […]

headline: ? The AI Trade's Next Test: Oracle, Adobe Earnings

headline: Fed Rate Decision, Broadcom and Costco Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: The Federal Reserve will hold its last rate-setting meeting of 2025 this week. A few notable earnings are also due, including Broadcom, Oracle and Adobe, plus retailer Costco. Here's what to expect: Today  Earnings: AutoZone, Campbell’s, Cracker Barrel (read more), GameStop   Economic data: October job openings and labor turnover survey (JOLTS).
